message_1: Find the greatest common divisor of 24 and 36.
message_2:
The greatest common divisor (GCD) of 24 and 36 can be found using the Euclidean algorithm or by listing the factors of each number and finding the highest one they have in common.

Factors of 24: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24
Factors of 36: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 9, 12, 18, 36

The highest common factor is 12. Therefore, the greatest common divisor of 24 and 36 is 12.
